channel.title: [2010/08/09 11:16:42] [AnonymousIoService-14]: Session has been closed..."
channel.description:
Dear moparscapians,
I am trying to get my 525 client to connect to my 525 server but the server seems to just reject everything I try: Localhost, 127.0.0.1, or 0.0.0.0. Look at the error and please try to help sort this out? Thanks!!!!!!!!
[img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/ee8d5a8e1e5641fafe8f6cc25c54939d4g.jpg[/img]
Thank you for your help! Ghostly150
